name: Ultimate Soup Maker PRO
description:
Ultimate Soup Maker PRO

Move bowl to catch all tomatoes to make the best tomato soup ever!

Arrow left - move left

Arrow right -move right

Please! be a good player and don't move away from screen, i don't have much time to fix this :)

Catch only Tomatoes!!!

Made under 2 hours for PaintJam 2021

Created by @Zbyszggo @HappieGames
